Title: Azure Alignment
Description:
The bonds of this community... the friendship and family they share. 

I... never had that. The blue dragonflight never had that. And maybe that's because we haven't had a chance to. 

Now is the time. I must gather my kind. 

Meet me at the Azure Archives. There is much to be done.
ObjectivesText: Return to Kalecgos in the Azure Archives.
RewardText: I never expected to learn so much from the tuskarr. I think I'll visit when I can, and maintain those bonds of friendship.
